summary: "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs" is a classic 1937 animated movie by Walt Disney. It's based on a German fairy tale and was the first full-length animated film made in the U.S. Despite doubts, it was a huge hit, earning over $8 million and becoming the highest-grossing film of 1938. It was nominated for an Academy Award and won Walt Disney an honorary Oscar. The film is still considered one of the best animated movies and has influenced culture with theme parks, games, and more. It's preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry.
title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937 film)
